ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Planes time for ELfson!
ygData.msgSnippet: Manasong 8) J/K What i ve seen in planes when grouping with the bards was pretty much nivs, haste, mana, heal and i think poison resist or disease resist.
ygData.messageBody:
Manasong 8)
J/K
What i've seen in planes when grouping with the bards was pretty much nivs,
haste, mana, heal and i think poison resist or disease resist. Sorry been so
long since i went up. Im sure one of the big boys on the list would be much
more qualified to answer that question

i'd suggest you nag your 3 people that go regularly, strong chance that they
might not have a bard on their regular trips or their bard is pretty decked
out, meaning you can have leftovers stuff. A tip, dont sing when they're
pulling or you'll be seeing the ol "someone wishes to ressurect you, do you
wish this?"

My bard isnt planes ready yet, but damn i cant wait.

Minkin lev 40 bard
Rakka lev 52 necro
Sol Ro

-----Original Message-----
From: Legba Work [mailto:mattdeba@...]
Sent: October 5, 2000 9:09 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: [eqbards] Planes time for ELfson!


Woohoo! I broke out of 45 last night (man that level stunk). I am well
into my death buffer (got 2 bubs in an empty SolB last night due to lag, we
held all three King, Priest and Champ rooms), so I am raring up for planes.

A few questions: How do you get invited to go on Planes? I only know like
3 people who go to them regularly, and my guild is still at least a month
away from being capable of doing it on our own.

Any sites have a goodplanes guide I could read?

What songs seem to be the songs of choice there?



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
